sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import BonusBridgeExplanation from './BonusBridgeExplanation'; import './GameScoreSheet.css'; const GameScoreSheet = ({ gameState, onNewGame }) => { const [selectedDeal, setSelectedDeal] = useState(null); const [showDetailPopup, setShowDetailPopup] = useState(false); const [showExplanation, setShowExplanation] = useState(false); // Calculate totals for display const partyBridgeNS = gameState.scores.nsTotal || 0; const partyBridgeEW = gameState.scores.ewTotal || 0; const bonusBridgeNS = gameState.scores.bonusNsTotal || 0; const bonusBridgeEW = gameState.scores.bonusEwTotal || 0; // Determine winners const partyBridgeWinner = partyBridgeNS > partyBridgeEW ? 'North-South' : 'East-West'; const bonusBridgeWinner = bonusBridgeNS > bonusBridgeEW ? 'North-South' : 'East-West'; // Handle opening the detail popup const openDetailPopup = (deal) => { setSelectedDeal(deal); setShowDetailPopup(true); }; // Handle closing the detail popup const closeDetailPopup = () => { setShowDetailPopup(false); setSelectedDeal(null); }; // Handle opening the explanation popup const handleOpenExplanation = () => { setShowExplanation(true); }; // Handle closing the explanation popup const handleCloseExplanation = () => { setShowExplanation(false); }; return (

Game Score Summary

Party Bridge (Standard Scoring)

North-South: {partyBridgeNS}
East-West: {partyBridgeEW}
Winner: {partyBridgeWinner}

Bonus Bridge Scoring

North-South: {bonusBridgeNS}
East-West: {bonusBridgeEW}
Winner: {bonusBridgeWinner}

Deals Summary

{gameState.deals.map((deal) => ( ))}
Deal Contract Result Party Bridge Bonus Bridge Details
{deal.dealNumber} {deal.contract || 'Passed'} {deal.result !== null ? (deal.result >= 0 ? `+${deal.result}` : deal.result) : '-'} {deal.nsPoints > 0 ? `NS: +${deal.nsPoints}` : ''} {deal.ewPoints > 0 ? `EW: +${deal.ewPoints}` : ''} {deal.bonusNsPoints > 0 ? `NS: +${deal.bonusNsPoints}` : ''} {deal.bonusEwPoints > 0 ? `EW: +${deal.bonusEwPoints}` : ''}
{/* Detail Popup */} {showDetailPopup && selectedDeal && (

Deal {selectedDeal.dealNumber} Details

Contract:
{selectedDeal.contract || 'Passed'}
Result:
{selectedDeal.result !== null ? (selectedDeal.result >= 0 ? `+${selectedDeal.result}` : selectedDeal.result) : '-'}
Vulnerable:
{selectedDeal.vulnerable}

Party Bridge Score

NS Points:
{selectedDeal.nsPoints}
EW Points:
{selectedDeal.ewPoints}

Bonus Bridge Score

NS Points:
{selectedDeal.bonusNsPoints}
EW Points:
{selectedDeal.bonusEwPoints}
{selectedDeal.handAnalysis && (

Hand Analysis

HCP:
{selectedDeal.handAnalysis.hcp || '0'}
Voids:
{selectedDeal.handAnalysis.voids || '0'}
Long Suits:
{selectedDeal.handAnalysis.longSuits || '0'}

Bonus Bridge Calculation Steps

  1. Raw Score / 20: {(selectedDeal.rawScore / 20).toFixed(1)} points
  2. HCP Adjustment: {selectedDeal.handAnalysis.hcpAdjustment || '0'} points
  3. After HCP Adjustment: {selectedDeal.handAnalysis.afterHcpAdjustment || '0'} points
  4. Performance Variance: {selectedDeal.handAnalysis.performanceVariance || '0'} tricks
  5. After Performance Assessment: {selectedDeal.handAnalysis.afterPerformanceAssessment || '0'} points
  6. Contract Type Adjustment: {selectedDeal.handAnalysis.contractTypeAdjustment || '0'} points
  7. After Contract Adjustments: {selectedDeal.handAnalysis.afterContractAdjustments || '0'} points
  8. Distribution Adjustment: {selectedDeal.handAnalysis.distributionAdjustment || '0'} points
  9. Defender Reward: {selectedDeal.handAnalysis.defenderReward || '0'} points
)}
)} {/* Explanation Popup */} {showExplanation && ( )}
); }; export default GameScoreSheet;
